original_title: 妻が極道の男に半年間、毎日中出しされていたなんて知らなかった。 夏目彩春
overview: My encounter with that man was triggered by taking over my brother's debt. The man fell in love with me at first sight and asked me to be his woman. He forcibly violates me who keeps refusing ... From that day on, he has been hugging me without missing a day.
title: I Didn’t Know That My Wife Got A Creampie Every Day For Half-A-Year From An Underworld Guy. Iroha Natsume
